15.1.2.1.1. blog_app.tests.test_article package¶

15.1.2.1.1.1. Submodules¶

15.1.2.1.1.2. blog_app.tests.test_article.test_app module¶

blog_app.tests.test_article.test_app.client()[source]¶
blog_app.tests.test_article.test_app.tesT_create_list_get(client)[source]¶
blog_app.tests.test_article.test_app.test_create_article(client)[source]¶

GIVEN request data for new article WHEN endpoint /create-article/ is called THEN it should return Article in json format that matches the schema

blog_app.tests.test_article.test_app.test_create_article_bad_request(client, data)[source]¶

GIVEN request data with invalid values or missing attributes WHEN endpoint /create-article/ is called THEN it should return status 400

blog_app.tests.test_article.test_app.test_get_article(client)[source]¶

GIVEN ID of article stored in the database WHEN endpoint /article/<id-of-article>/ is called THEN it should return Article in json format that matches the schema

blog_app.tests.test_article.test_app.test_list_articles(client)[source]¶

GIVEN articles stored in the database WHEN endpoint /article-list/ is called THEN it should return list of Article in json format that matches the schema

blog_app.tests.test_article.test_app.validate_payload(payload, schema_name)[source]¶

Validate payload with selected schema

15.1.2.1.1.3. blog_app.tests.test_article.test_commands module¶

blog_app.tests.test_article.test_commands.test_create_article()[source]¶

GIVEN CreateArticleCommand with valid author, title, and content properties WHEN the execute method is called THEN a new Article must exist in the database with the same attributes

blog_app.tests.test_article.test_commands.test_create_article_already_exists()[source]¶

GIVEN CreateArticleCommand with a title of some article in database WHEN the execute method is called THEN the AlreadyExists exception must be raised

15.1.2.1.1.4. blog_app.tests.test_article.test_queries module¶

blog_app.tests.test_article.test_queries.test_get_article_by_id()[source]¶

GIVEN ID of article stored in the database WHEN the execute method is called on GetArticleByIDQuery with an ID THEN it should return the article with the same ID

blog_app.tests.test_article.test_queries.test_list_articles()[source]¶

GIVEN 2 articles stored in the database WHEN the execute method is called THEN it should return 2 articles

15.1.2.1.1.5. Module contents¶
